text: Kevin Forrest Cash (born December 6, 1977 in Tampa, Florida) is an American baseball manager for the Tampa Bay Rays of Major League Baseball (MLB). He previously played catcher for the Boston Red Sox, Houston Astros, New York Yankees, Tampa Bay Devil Rays, and Toronto Blue Jays. ==Other websites== *Kevin Cash at mlb.com Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:American baseball players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Houston Astros players Category:New York Yankees players Category:Tampa Bay Rays Category:Tampa Bay Devil Rays players Category:Toronto Blue Jays players Category:Sportspeople from Tampa, Florida
title: Kevin Cash
